pageone.title: Covid 19 Tracker
pageone.subtitle: Get the Facts About Coronavirus Daily cases update around the world.

pagetwo.title: Learn as you go
pagetwo.subtitle: Take steps to care for yourself and help protect others in your home and community.

pagethree.title: Travel Advisories
pagethree.subtitle: Official travel advisories issued by governments across the globe.

pagefour.title: Stay At Home
pagefour.subtitle: If you have symptoms of COVID-19 however mild, self-isolate for at least 10 days from when your symptoms started.

settingscreen.aboutinfo: We source data from Open Disease Data, Daily updated travel advisories and The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
